1.16.3.1.1.0:
Added Advanced Importer.
Made netherite crafter clearer when active.
Added the ability to switch modes for crafters.
Fixed a bug on the server.
1.16.3.1.0.0: First beta of Extra Storage for Minecraft 1.16.3

1.16.4.1.2.2:
Fix ResourceLocation's bug.
Update Forge and Refined Storage.
1.16.4.1.2.1:
The orientation of the crafter is the same as that of the RS.
Fixed a bug with Carry On.
1.16.4.1.2.0: First release of ExtraStorage for Minecraft 1.16.4

1.16.5.1.6.0:
Quark sorting disabled in crafters.
Disabled the mekanism cardboard box.
1.16.5.1.5.0:
Added Neural Processor.
Updated recipes for crafters.
1.16.5.1.4.1:
Crafters are now stackable.
Crafters are lit up at night.
Fixed recipe to accept all crafters.
1.16.5.1.4.0:
Speed up the insertion of patterns (thanks to monofins).
Added Russian language (thanks to DrHesperus).
Crafters now remember their name when broken.
